alert.note: Alert for Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:29PM CDT until June 20 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAFOURCHE...SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON AND WEST CENTRAL PLAQUEMINES PARISHES... At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Leeville to 15 miles northeast of Port Fourchon to 22 miles southwest of Port Sulphur to 17 miles southwest of Empire, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Port Fourchon and Grand Isle. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
